amendment.description: Amendment requires the Coast Guard to study the facility infrastructure requirements needed to fulfill the Coast Guard's missions and capabilities, and ensures that the department in which the Coast Guard is operating maintains the ability to utilize the latest technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 111-311 to require the Coast Guard to study the facility infrastructure requirements needed to fulfill the Coast Guard's missions and capabilities, and ensure that the department in which the Coast Guard is operating maintains the ability to utilize the latest technologies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kratovil amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 398 - 0 (Roll no. 812).
